00028 #include <stdio.h>
00029 #include "mscb.h"
00030 
00031 extern bit FREEZE_MODE;
00032 extern bit DEBUG_MODE;
00033 
00034 char code node_name[] = "SCS-500-PT100";
00035 
00036 /*---- Define channels and configuration parameters returned to
00037        the CMD_GET_INFO command                                 ----*/
00038 
00039 /* data buffer (mirrored in EEPROM) */
00040 
00041 struct {
00042    float temp[8];
00043 } idata user_data;
00044 
00045 struct {
00046    float gain_cal;              // gain calibration
00047    float ofs_cal;               // offset calibration
00048 } idata user_conf;
00049 
00050 float idata gain[8];            // gain resulting from PGA bits
00051 
00052 MSCB_INFO_CHN code channel[] = {
00053    4, UNIT_CELSIUS, 0, 0, MSCBF_FLOAT, "Temp0", &user_data.temp[0],
00054    4, UNIT_CELSIUS, 0, 0, MSCBF_FLOAT, "Temp1", &user_data.temp[1],
00055    4, UNIT_CELSIUS, 0, 0, MSCBF_FLOAT, "Temp2", &user_data.temp[2],
00056    4, UNIT_CELSIUS, 0, 0, MSCBF_FLOAT, "Temp3", &user_data.temp[3],
00057    4, UNIT_CELSIUS, 0, 0, MSCBF_FLOAT, "Temp4", &user_data.temp[4],
00058    4, UNIT_CELSIUS, 0, 0, MSCBF_FLOAT, "Temp5", &user_data.temp[5],
00059    4, UNIT_CELSIUS, 0, 0, MSCBF_FLOAT, "Temp6", &user_data.temp[6],
00060    4, UNIT_CELSIUS, 0, 0, MSCBF_FLOAT, "Temp7", &user_data.temp[7],
00061    0
00062 };
00063 
00064 /* Usage of gain:
00065 
00066  Bipol.     Ext.  PGA          Int. PGA       Gain
00067 
00068   Bit5      Bit4 Bit3       Bit2 Bit1 Bit0
00069    0         0    0          0    0    0       1
00070    0         0    0          0    0    1       2
00071    0         0    0          0    1    0       4
00072    0         0    0          0    1    1       8
00073    0         0    0          1    0    0      16
00074    0         0    0          1    1    0       0.5
00075 
00076    0         0    1          0    0    0      10
00077    0         1    0          0    0    0     100
00078    0         1    1          0    0    0    1000
00079 
00080    1  bipolar, represents external jumper setting
00081 */
00082 
00083 MSCB_INFO_CHN code conf_param[] = {
00084    4, UNIT_FACTOR, 0, 0, MSCBF_FLOAT, "GainCal", &user_conf.gain_cal,
00085    4, UNIT_CELSIUS, 0, 0, MSCBF_FLOAT, "OfsCal", &user_conf.ofs_cal,
00086    0
00087 };
00088 
00089 /********************************************************************\
00090 
00091   Application specific init and inout/output routines
00092 
00093 \********************************************************************/
00094 
00095 void user_write(unsigned char channel);
00096 
00097 /*---- User init function ------------------------------------------*/
00098 
00099 extern SYS_INFO sys_info;
00100 
00101 void user_init(void)
00102 {
00103    AMX0CF = 0x00;               // select single ended analog inputs
00104    ADC0CF = 0xE0;               // 16 system clocks, gain 1
00105    ADC0CN = 0x80;               // enable ADC 
00106 
00107    REF0CN = 0x03;               // enable internal reference
00108    DAC0CN = 0x80;               // enable DAC0
00109    DAC1CN = 0x80;               // enable DAC1
00110 
00111    /* correct initial EEPROM value */
00112    if (user_conf.gain_cal < 0.1 || user_conf.gain_cal > 10)
00113       user_conf.gain_cal = 1;
00114 
00115    if (user_conf.ofs_cal < -1 || user_conf.ofs_cal > 1)
00116       user_conf.ofs_cal = 0;
00117 
00118    // DEBUG_MODE = 1;
00119 }
00120 
00121 /*---- User write function -----------------------------------------*/
00122 
00123 #pragma NOAREGS
00124 
00125 void user_write(unsigned char channel)
00126 {
00127    if (channel);
00128 }
00129 
00130 /*---- User read function ------------------------------------------*/
00131 
00132 unsigned char user_read(unsigned char channel)
00133 {
00134    if (channel == 0);
00135    return 0;
00136 }
00137 
00138 /*---- User write config function ----------------------------------*/
00139 
00140 void user_write_conf(unsigned char channel)
00141 {
00142    if (channel);
00143 }
00144 
00145 /*---- User read config function -----------------------------------*/
00146 
00147 void user_read_conf(unsigned char channel)
00148 {
00149    if (channel);
00150 }
00151 
00152 /*---- User function called vid CMD_USER command -------------------*/
00153 
00154 unsigned char user_func(unsigned char idata * data_in, unsigned char idata * data_out)
00155 {
00156    /* echo input data */
00157    data_out[0] = data_in[0];
00158    data_out[1] = data_in[1];
00159    return 2;
00160 }
00161 
00162 /*---- User loop function ------------------------------------------*/
00163 
00164 void adc_read(channel, float *d)
00165 {
00166    unsigned long value;
00167    unsigned int i, n;
00168    float gvalue;
00169 
00170    AMX0SL = channel & 0x0F;
00171    ADC0CF = 0xE0;               // 16 system clocks, gain 1
00172 
00173    n = 1 << (8 + 4);
00174 
00175    value = 0;
00176    for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00177       DISABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00178 
00179       ADCINT = 0;
00180       ADBUSY = 1;
00181       while (!ADCINT);          // wait until conversion ready, does NOT work with ADBUSY!
00182 
00183       ENABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00184 
00185       value += (ADC0L | (ADC0H << 8));
00186       watchdog_refresh();
00187    }
00188 
00189    value >>= 8;
00190 
00191    /* convert to volts */
00192    gvalue = value / 65536.0 * 2.5;
00193 
00194    /* external voltage divider */
00195    gvalue *= 0.5 * user_conf.gain_cal;
00196 
00197    /* convert to Ohms (15V supply, 2kOhm resistor) */
00198    gvalue = (2000 * gvalue) / (15 - gvalue);
00199 
00200    /* convert Ohms to Celsius, valid -100.100 deg., error <0.04K */
00201    gvalue -= 100;
00202    gvalue = 0.0011 * gvalue * gvalue + 2.5558 * gvalue;
00203 
00204    /* correct for offset */
00205    gvalue += user_conf.ofs_cal;
00206 
00207    DISABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00208    *d = gvalue;
00209    ENABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00210 }
00211 
00212 void user_loop(void)
00213 {
00214    static unsigned char i = 0;
00215    static unsigned long last = 300;
00216    static bit first = 1;
00217 
00218    adc_read(i, &user_data.temp[i]);
00219    i = (i + 1) % 8;
00220 
00221    if (!DEBUG_MODE && time() > last + 30) {
00222       if (first) {
00223          lcd_clear();
00224          first = 0;
00225       }
00226 
00227       last = time();
00228 
00229       lcd_goto(0, 0);
00230       printf("CH1: %6.1f C   ", user_data.temp[0]);
00231 
00232       lcd_goto(0, 1);
00233       printf("CH2: %6.1f C   ", user_data.temp[1]);
00234    }
00235 }
